name: On the Perils of Parrots - DEMO
name_original: On the Perils of Parrots - DEMO
description:
Take on the role of an AI, created by the world renowned, Dr. G. 

Step through a battery of cognition tests in order to prove your intelligence, sentience and ultimately your humanity, in this Puzzle Narrative experience that explores the line between machine and personhood.

Controls:

  • WASD to move
  • SPACE to Reset a level (WARNING: Dr. G may terminate instance)

Note:

  • cookies will need to be enabled for full functionality
